allow: Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker exec observabilidade-api npx prisma db push")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d --build api worker")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker logs observabilidade-worker 2>&1 | Select-String -Pattern ''Status mudou|Notifica|Canal|Alerta criado''")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker exec observabilidade-api npx prisma db execute --stdin" -InputObject "UPDATE monitors SET current_status = NULL;")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "''UPDATE monitors SET current_status = NULL;'' | docker exec -i observabilidade-postgres psql -U postgres -d observabilidade")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache api && docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d api")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml build --no-cache api worker")
Bash(powershell.exe -Command "docker compose -f docker-compose.prod.yml up -d api worker")

feat: Add Teams feature with multi-tenant support and Portainer deployment

- Add Teams module with RBAC \(Admin, Editor, Viewer roles\)
- Implement team invites via email and shareable links
- Migrate all resources \(monitors, alerts, status pages\) to team-based ownership
- Add TeamContext and TeamSelector for frontend team switching
- Create team management pages \(settings, members, invites\)
- Add public invite acceptance flow
- Configure docker-entrypoint.sh for auto database sync
- Add docker-compose.portainer.yml for production deployment with Traefik
- Add DEPLOY.md documentation for Portainer setup
